title: Chat filter bug (Super Annoying) (Sometimes detrimental to gameplay)
body:
I have put off posting about this on the boards since the LCU came out, but every single time I am in game I cannot see swear words or any "inappropriate" in chat. It only occurs in game, but in the actual client, its not an issue. Please Please fix this. I am getting frustrated seeing stars in chat over and over again.

(Also if there is a workaround, please help me out)

replies.body:
Yup, there is a workaround.  You're right that it's the LCU too.
I think you have to disable the filter in the old client for it to work.

> [{quoted}](name=LostFr0st,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=yp0sAvNh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-24T20:03:28.308+0000)
>
> Yup, there is a workaround.  You're right that it's the LCU too.
> I think you have to disable the filter in the old client for it to work.

Yep, this is all correct! There are still some features that aren't available in LCU, but can still be accessed and changed in the legacy client. If you aren't sure how to pop back over to the legacy client, all you need to do is 

- Open the client
- Click the 'Launch Legacy Client button (yellow text) in the lower right hand side of the login screen
- Log in as usual
